ComicInfo.Summary:
Hellboy is back on earth, and the B.P.R.D. struggles to understand his unwillingness to hunt the demon threatening to turn the earth into a literal Hell.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Sebastián Fiumara, Max Fiumara & Dave Stewart | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Mike Mignola & Dave Stewart | 2 | Note: Number #153 in a series.
